::Rodimus Prime::

As Rodimus was waiting in the briefing room for Perseus, he got to thinkng about his family. He hadn't checked up on them in a while.

Roddy opens a channel.

Rodimus(via comm): Nightlight, Elita, you copy? I just wanted to check up on you two. Make sure everything was ok.

Kraftlos <kraftlos@...> wrote:                                  "Why don't you protect the base?  We need all the help we can..." said Ravenchief to Elita.  After saying this, he looked up to Nightlight, realizing he probably shouldn't have put that idea in her mind.
  
"We'll need you're help to keep everyone safe.  Make sure you do what your mom tells you!" he said, then leaving down the hallway to the command center.


On 2/27/07,  xochitla2006 <xochitla2006@...> wrote:                                     ELita:
 
 "I want o go , Ravenchief, I'm brave enough also I can scare off 
 bots"begged teh girl
 
 -- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <warriorazure@...> wrote:
 >
 > Doc kept on walking beside Perseus, clearly intent on finally joining
 > the action.
 > 
 > Doc: What do we know about that bot? If we can get a tech scan of him,
 > we could prepare our defenses better.
 > 
 >
